mapper.insert:
insert
into tb_dtpaper ( dp_no , emp_no , dp_title , dp_final , dp_category , dp_origin , dp_change
) values (
10||seq_vac.nextval
20||seq_otw.nextval
30||seq_res.nextval
40||seq_coop.nextval
, #{ empNo } , #{ dpTitle } , '임시저장' , #{ dpCategory } , #{ dpOrigin } , #{ dpChange } )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tb_dtpaper where dp_final =
'임시저장'
'반려됨'
and dp_status = 'N' and emp_no = ${ empNo }

select dp_no ,emp_no ,dp_title ,to_char(dp_create, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dp_create" ,dp_modify ,dp_status ,dp_final ,dp_category ,dp_origin ,dp_change from tb_dtpaper where dp_final =
'임시저장'
'반려됨'
and dp_status = 'N' and emp_no = #{ empNo } order by dp_create desc

select d.dp_no ,emp_no ,dp_title ,to_char(dp_create, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dp_create" ,dp_modify ,dp_status ,dp_final ,dp_category ,dp_origin ,dp_change ,(select emp_name from tb_sign join tb_employee on (signemp_no = emp_no) where dp_no = d.dp_no and si_seq = (select max(si_seq) from tb_sign where dp_no = d.dp_no) ) AS sign_empname ,(select to_char(si_appdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from tb_sign s where s.dp_no = d.dp_no and si_seq = (select max(si_seq) from tb_sign where dp_no = d.dp_no) ) AS lastSigndate from tb_dtpaper d where dp_final =
'진행중' or dp_final = '대기'
'결재완료'
and dp_status = 'N' and d.emp_no = #{ empNo } order by dp_create desc

select count(*) from tb_dtpaper where dp_final =
'진행중' or dp_final = '대기'
'결재완료'
and dp_status = 'N' and emp_no = ${ empNo }

select count(*) from tb_dtpaper d join tb_sign s on ( d.dp_no = s.dp_no) join tb_employee e on (d.emp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department p on (e.dep_cd = p.dep_cd) where dp_final = '진행중' or dp_final = '대기' and dp_status = 'N' and si_status = 'C' and signemp_no = #{ empNo } and e.dep_cd != (select f.dep_cd from tb_sign s join tb_employee f on (s.signemp_no = f.emp_no) join tb_department c on (f.dep_cd = c.dep_cd ) where dp_no = d.dp_no and signemp_no = #{empNo} ) order by dp_modify desc, dp_create desc
